long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Vodacast Hub Browser Extension is built for podcasters to quickly organize and save content while researching an upcoming episode. 
 
Create Planning Boards in the Vodacast Hub or create them on the fly with the extension. When you save images and links across the web, it will appear in the appropriate Planning Board. Once the content has been gathered, push the content to the Episode Board and build out your bonus content for fans.
 
To begin, follow this link to claim your podcast and create an account: 
 
https://hub.vodacast.com/claimyourpodcast
 
Then install the extension, login and start saving content!
